titles.title: To rename the portion of United States Highway 75 between President George Bush Turnpike and United States Highway 380 as the "U.S. Congressman and Prisoner of War Sam Johnson Memorial Highway".
To rename the portion of United States Highway 75 between President George Bush Turnpike and United States Highway 380 as the "U.S. Congressman and Prisoner of War Sam Johnson Memorial Highway".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Highways and Transit.

bill.summary: This bill renames the portion of U.S. Highway 75 between President George Bush Turnpike and U.S. Highway 380 as the U.S. Congressman and Prisoner of War Sam Johnson Memorial Highway. Currently, this portion of the highway is designated as the Sam Johnson Highway.
